title: Ep. 146 S&A Investor - RICK RULE: Big Opportunity in Junior Miners
itunes:title: RICK RULE: Big Opportunity in Junior Miners
description: Legendary resource investor Rick Rule says it's almost time to invest in junior mining stocks. Rule explains what to look for before buying stocks in the resource sector. He also discusses the return of the gold standard, the huge growth in LNG, and why fracking may never make its way into China.
